text:
Rahul Bose hosts charity auction

An auction, hosted by actor Rahul Bose and his NGO, ‘The Foundation’, received an “overwhelming response” in Mumbai.

“It (response) has been overwhelming — the massive size of Mumbai’s heart always amazes me. We exceeded our expectations and we promise to meet our donors’ expectations,” Bose said in a statement. A guitar signed by the band Coldplay, boxer Mary Kom’s Olympic bronze-medal-winning kit and a T-shirt signed by badminton star Sania Nehwal were among the items featured at the charity auction. — PTI
title: ENT-RAHUL
